title: (x) Gill Sans with flag on 1 - Gill Sans w/ Alternate One {Yves}
content:
This should be an easy one.

I think I recall there was a version of Gill Sans which has a flag on the number 1 instead of the flagless 1 with which we are all familiar.

Like this:

[http://www.hyperreal.org/raves/database/gallery/images\_temp/hacienda\_memb\_grey\_yellow.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20060504032626/http:/www.hyperreal.org/raves/database/gallery/images_temp/hacienda_memb_grey_yellow.jpg)

But who released this version?
author: rucola

comments.content:
You need [Monotype](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Monotype)â€™s [Gill Sans w/ Alternate One](http://web.archive.org/web/20060504032626/http:/www.fontshop.com/?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&searchby=manufacturer&displayfontid=M.7726.0.1).

_The new OpenType version of Gill Sans has it as well, plus all the other stuff like small saps, hanging figures and the lot._
